# Tender Information

## Title
EREP: 6" Trash Pump Skid Mount

## Abstract
The Canadian Coast Guard is seeking a supplier to provide Skid Mounted 6" Trash Pump Systems capable of transferring water that may contain solids up to 3" in diameter at a low pressure and high flow.

## Background
This procurement is part of the Environmental Response Equipment (ERE) Program for the Canadian Coast Guard, and forms part of the Oceans Protection Plan announced in November 2016.

## Requirements
- The ERE Program will replace aging ER equipment and introduce new response technologies to over 80 locations across Canada.
- The requirement is subject to the provisions of the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-AGP), the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), and other international trade agreements.
- The procurement methods will be in accordance with the Public Services and Procurement Canada's (PSPC) Terms and Conditions for the federal government contracting process.
- The Canadian Contractors Program (FCP) for employment equity applies to this procurement.

## Tender Details

### Contracting Entity
Public Works and Government Services Canada

### End User Entity
Fisheries and Oceans Canada

### Contract Type
Request for Proposal

### Contract Name
EREP: Skid Mounted 6" Trash Pump

### Type of Goods/Services
Trade Agreement: CETA/WTO-AGP/CPTPP/FTAs with Canada and Peru/Colombia/Panama/Korea/UK

### Contracting Agency
Public Works and Government Services Canada

### Regions of Opportunity
Nova Scotia, Quebec (except NCR), Ontario (except NCR), British Columbia, and Northwest Territories

### Regions of Delivery
Nova Scotia, Quebec (except NCR), Ontario (except NCR), British Columbia, and Northwest Territories

### Trade Agreements Applied
World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-AGP)
Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)

### Preferred Bid Procedures and Evaluation Criteria
 Lowest Price/Lowest Cost
Competitive Tendering

## Conditions of Participation

- The prize will be awarded to the supplier able to deliver the EREP for 6" Trash Pump Systems.
- Only submissions by CPC Connect service
